ru.Invite your friends and get KKX POINTS t: Пригласи друзей и собирай KKX POINTS вместе
ru.You get {bonus} KKX POINTS for each frie: За каждого приведенного друга, ты получаешь по {bonus} KKX POINTS
ru.Boost levels and and collect more KKX po: Прокачивай уровни буста и собирай больше KKX POINTS
ru.Collect more KKX points to break into th: Собирай больше KKX POINTS, чтобы выбиться в топ 100 лидеров, среди которых происходит розыгрыш призов
ru.Complete tasks and get KKX POINTS, which: Выполняй задания и получай KKX POINTS, которые можешь потратить на бусты

en.Invite your friends and get KKX POINTS t: Invite your friends and get KKX POINTS together
en.You get {bonus} KKX POINTS for each frie: You get {bonus} KKX POINTS for each friend you bring in
en.Boost levels and and collect more KKX po: Boost levels and and collect more KKX points
en.Collect more KKX points to break into th: Collect more KKX points to break into the top 100 leaders, among which there will be a prize draw
en.Complete tasks and get KKX POINTS, which: Complete tasks and get KKX POINTS, which you can spend on boosts
